name: Stockpile Management
description:
Mouse Only
Please use the info on main menu or the ? on the main scene and read carefully to know what each number is.

Trijam 213 Stockpile submission.
This game was made in 178 minutes. I tried to encourage stockpiling by making the game require resource management and having it lead directly to game over if you have insufficient resources.
Due to the low amount time I had failed to find the time to balance everything and there is also a slight border on the right.
There may also be a bug as when getting screenshots it crashed on me.

Music + sound effects made in BeepBox.
Art (Sword, Axe, Berries, Hammer, Anvil) made by me during time in Krita.
